Uses of Class
Word

    • Uses of Word in <Unnamed>

      Fields in <Unnamed> with type parameters of type Word 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.util.Vector<Word> TextCompare.wordCompareVector
      TextCompare objects have two attributes: 1) a wordCompareVector which contains the Word objects read in from a text file 2) a dictionaryWordVector which contains the DictionaryWord objects read in from a dictionary file
      static java.util.Vector<Word> Panel.wordVector 
      Methods in <Unnamed> that return types with arguments of type Word 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Vector<Word> TextCompare.compareText(java.lang.String textFile, java.lang.String dictionaryFile)
      The compare Text method calls the readFile method to read a text file and calls the readDictionary method to read a dictionary file.
      Methods in <Unnamed> with parameters of type Word 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean TextCompare.addWordToDictionary(Word addThis)
      The addWordToDictionary method adds a word to the dictionaryWordVector as visible
      boolean TextCompare.ignoreWord(Word ignoreThis)
      The ignoreWord method adds a word to the dictionaryWordVector as ignored
      boolean TextCompare.replaceWord(Word original, java.lang.String replacement)
      The replaceWord method changes the text field of a given word, so long as the word is not already in the dictionary
